msbt.message: , you sly thing. I heard the fabulous news!YOU have set out to improve our little island's reputation so we can host a concert!
, you sly thing. I heard the fabulous news!YOU have set out to improve our little island's reputation so we can host a concert!
I totally approve, darling! Reputation is so very important.In fact, I'm sure I could be of help. I mean, really, you know I'm good at this sort of popularity thing.
Sooowhat should we do I've got it!We should set up a GORGEOUS spot for taking photographsThen watch as word spreads and our island becomes THE next hot selfie spot! Genius, isn't it?

I tell you what. If I find anything that would look AHmazing in photographs, I'll give it to you. I don't have anything like that on me at the moment, I'm afraidThen again, you're carrying so much right now, I suppose you couldn't take it anyway, .
And wouldn't you know it, I have just the thing!
! Use it to decorate the island and it will totally set the scene. You'll see. I mean, you might need to add a few more items to really make it POP, but you get the idea, .
So, , how is the island's popularity campaign going? I'm dying to know, !

I've seen you running about with your pockets full to bursting. I don't know how you do it. It'sinspiring. Anyhoo, I've been keeping an eye on all your hard work, so if there's anything you need, do let me know.
Oh! Guess what! I happen to have something VERY photogenic on me right now!
In fact, I happen to have another fabulously photogenic item I brought just for you
! It is perfect for giving the island scenery a bit of pizazz. You'll see. Add a few more items to really make things POP, and our island will be more POPular than ever. Tee-hee!
Would you believe I had to order this from another island, ? It will add JUST the cosmopolitan touch our island needs to improve its reputation. Trust me, darling!
You see, it's a recipe for making .And trust me when I say this Something made by YOU is sure to increase our island's popularity. So do be sure to put that handmade to good use, .
